0260/A0/05/884/001.indicator_name: CRM Strategy and Action plan developed.
0260/A0/05/884/001.headline: UNICEF Armenia continued to support to enhance national partnerships  coordination and coherence for Child Rights Monitoring which resulted in increased capacities of the NSS and HRDO through generation of equity-focused multidimensional poverty data  which will be used in CRM.

0260/A0/04/800/001.indicator_name: % of Office Committees fully functioning as per established ToRs

0260/A0/05/882/003.indicator_name: Guidelines for the Seismic Retrofit of Existing Schools and Design of New Schools in the Republic of Armenia are adopted by the Government.
0260/A0/05/882/003.headline: The Government's institutional commitment to a more pro-active approach in DRR has been increased  and the national and subnational capacities to address the safety of children and resilience issues in both educational facilities and in vulnerable communities has been enhanced.

0260/A0/05/882/003.indicator_name: Number of communities incorporating child sensitive disaster risk analysis into the community socio-economic plans.
0260/A0/05/882/003.headline: The Government's institutional commitment to a more pro-active approach in DRR has been increased  and the national and subnational capacities to address the safety of children and resilience issues in both educational facilities and in vulnerable communities has been enhanced.

0260/A0/05/882/003.indicator_name: Children attending seismically safe schools in line with national building codes
0260/A0/05/882/003.headline: The Government's institutional commitment to a more pro-active approach in DRR has been increased  and the national and subnational capacities to address the safety of children and resilience issues in both educational facilities and in vulnerable communities has been enhanced.

0260/A0/05/882/001.indicator_name: "(DEACTIVATED Jan 1 2017) Child povert data disaggregated by age  geographic location  sex  ethinicity or other relevant categories is available"
0260/A0/05/882/001.headline: UNICEF Armenia supported capacity development and advocacy efforts towards the fulfillment of child's right to social inclusion within the reform of integrated social services in the country  particularly case management  local social planning and institutional cooperation among social service providers.
0260/A0/05/882/001.target_value: Disaggregation is available  including other parameters if necessary

0260/A0/05/882/001.status_value: 64.5% of children are deprived according to 2015 data by NSS
0260/A0/05/882/001.indicator_name: National government measurement of child poverty using multidimensional measures
0260/A0/05/882/001.headline: UNICEF Armenia supported capacity development and advocacy efforts towards the fulfillment of child's right to social inclusion within the reform of integrated social services in the country  particularly case management  local social planning and institutional cooperation among social service providers.

0260/A0/05/882/004.indicator_name: The youth worker concept is part of the National Youth Policy Framework/National Youth Strategy.
0260/A0/05/882/004.headline: A needs assessment of the situation of adolescents and youth (10-30 years old) was conducted to develop strategic directions in the area of adolescents and youth  contributing to the CO engagement in the adolescents and youth programming and support to the Government in the development of a national youth policy.
0260/A0/05/882/004.baseline_value: The concept is not reflected in the policy (2015).
